title: Crossing to Live in the Wilderness Plains - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient Times   Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Beasts   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Clan Building   Cooking   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Farming   Hard-Working Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mature Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Mpreg   Proactive Protagonist   Seme Protagonist   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Survival   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Tribal Society   Weak Protagonist
author: Murong Libai   慕容离白
description:
Chen Qi’s life was as ordinary as his name. He didn’t expect that he would one day suddenly encounter something like crossing over into another world, let alone crossing over into the dangerous world of beastmen. He can’t hunt or change into a beast form, and even his physical strength was a slag’s level, so how would he survive in this dangerous beastman world?

Too dangerous outside? No matter, build a house, find food, make a comfortable home, and live in the beastmen tribe.

No tribe? No matter, we’ll build one ourselves.

This was the story of an ordinary person who worked hard every day to live and strived to make his life better.>
